1.content: sandy gets out of her moms car. the sun is shining, the birds are chirping and its the first day of her summer at camp. "Thanks mom" she says. sandy heads over to the check-in point where the counselor is waiting patiently. sandy then checks her name of the list and goes to find her cabin mates for the summer. she finds_____
1.title: going to camp.

info.brief_description: camp where one or more of the cabin mates are diapered
info.description:
Sandy- fully incontinent 14 year old who has never been out of diapers
Jess- sandy's best friend who wets the bed and may or may not know about her problem
Becka- girl that is new to town and likes to wear diapers
Tom- guy who has a crush on sandy and is an ab/dl
you may add characters as you go.
RULES
no sex
no drugs
no one option entries, unless you write the next immediately
no misspellings
